settings.title: the ides of march
settings.text_1: a very special series, featuring a handful of handmade, one-of-a-kind pieces, and the first-ever i+w graphic tee made directly from an original made by matt piece.  the "dirty dozen" tee.  (limited edition of 250)
settings.text_2: 24" x 30" acrylic and mixed media on canvas by matt eddmenson, 2022. the only one of its kind.
